edu.rit.swing
Interface Viewable

All Superinterfaces:
Displayable, Drawable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Drawing, Plot
public interface Viewable
extends Displayable

Interface Viewable specifies the interface for an object that can be viewed on the screen using the View program.

Method Summary
 DisplayableFrame getFrame()
          Get a displayable frame in which to view this viewable object.
 String getTitle()
          Get the title for the frame used to view this viewable object.
 
Methods inherited from interface edu.rit.swing.Displayable
getBackgroundPaint, getBoundingBox
 
Methods inherited from interface edu.rit.swing.Drawable
draw
 

Method Detail

getFrame

DisplayableFrame getFrame()
Get a displayable frame in which to view this viewable object. Initially, the returned frame is displaying this viewable object.

Returns:
Displayable frame.

getTitle

String getTitle()
Get the title for the frame used to view this viewable object. If the title is null, a default title is used.

Returns:
Title.
